basics.name: James chou
basics.label: Full-stack Developer
basics.summary: I'm a Brooklyn native who studied healthcare informatics and recently graduated from Actualize Coding Bootcamp to be a Full-stack developer. My dream is to apply both schools of knowledge to create the best health records system in America. During my time away from the computer, I enjoy extreme calisthenics and some good french fries

work.summary: Worked with a team of apprentices to create a web application for a Montessori Training program
highlights: Utilized Stripe to accept and track user payments
Implemented Mailgun API to send user notifications and registration emails
Generated new features for the application complete with  CRUD routes, view pages, and forms

work.summary: Trainer, Helpdesk, and Advisor for all matters of health records
highlights: Coordinate projects between clinical, fiscal, management, and executive staff to implement practice management and clinical documentation technology
Train clinical and fiscal staff to use medical records software

work.summary: A start-up health records and practice management solution vendor
highlights: Coordinate scheduled meetings between senior management and software development team to maintain and updated practice management software
Write and compile user manuals for newly implemented software features
